Title: Extends certain provisions of the general municipal law, relating to granting localities greater contract flexibility to authorize shared purchasing
Summary: Extends certain provisions of the general municipal law, relating to granting localities greater contract flexibility and cost savings by permitting certain shared purchasing among political subdivisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 308 of the laws of 2012, amending the general municipal law relating to providing local governments greater contract flexibility and cost savings by permitting certain shared purchasing among political subdivisions, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
